abstract: Polar Pioneer, one of two oil drilling rigs that Royal Dutch Shell intends to park in Seattle harbor, arrives in city despite protest from officials and environmentalists; rigs are awaiting start of Arctic drilling season.
lead_paragraph: A 400-foot-long Arctic oil drilling rig pulled by tugs arrived in Seattle waters Thursday despite environmentalists’ protests and the city’s opposition to letting it dock there.

headline.main: Washington: Oil Rig Arrives Amid Opposition
headline.print_headline: Washington: Oil Rig Arrives Amid Opposition

snippet: A 400-foot-long Arctic oil drilling rig pulled by tugs arrived in Seattle waters Thursday despite environmentalists’ protests and the city’s opposition to letting it dock there.
